Posted By: Ligerman30 (9/4/2012 7:15:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is also weak against "infect", [Black Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Sun's Zenith), [Tragic Slip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tragic Slip), [Mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutilate), [Oblivion ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion ring), [Revoke Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Revoke Existence), [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember)...   
  
Indestructible is a very misleading ability for new players. Part of the 3 most confusing abiltiys..  
1) Hexproof... Why is your wrath killing it!!!  
2) Indestructible... Why is your -X/-X killing it!!  
3) Protection... Why does this die to wrath again?? hes protection from white!!!   
  
 Its still a very good card. Hard to win against if you dont have an answer.
posts.html:
This guy is also weak against "infect", Black Sun's Zenith, Tragic Slip, Mutilate, Oblivion ring, Revoke Existence, Dismember...

Indestructible is a very misleading ability for new players. Part of the 3 most confusing abiltiys..
1) Hexproof... Why is your wrath killing it!!!
2) Indestructible... Why is your -X/-X killing it!!
3) Protection... Why does this die to wrath again?? hes protection from white!!!

Its still a very good card. Hard to win against if you dont have an answer.

posts.post_content:
I started out pairing this with [Blasphemous Act](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blasphemous Act), but you know who loves Stuffy Dolls? [Nin, the Pain Artist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nin, the Pain Artist).   
If you can get a cheaper reusable [Blue Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blue Sun's Zenith) plus a slightly more expensive reusable [Blaze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blaze) and both happen at instant speed, you are doing something right.
